messages.footer_disclaimer_line2: TripAdvisor LLC makes no guarantees for availability of prices advertised on our sites and applications. Listed prices may require a stay of a particular length or have blackout dates, qualifications or other applicable restrictions. TripAdvisor LLC is not responsible for any content on external web sites that are not owned or operated by Tripadvisor.

messages.footer_disclaimer_line3: TripAdvisor LLC is not a booking agent or tour operator. When you book with one of our partners, please be sure to check their site for a full disclosure of all applicable fees.

messages.covid19_restaurant_gift_card_info: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, many diners are eating at home rather than dining out. faqs.question: Does Mivan Restaurant Cafe offer takeout?
faqs.answer: Yes, Mivan Restaurant Cafe offers takeout services.
faqs.answerJsonLd: Yes, Mivan Restaurant Cafe offers takeout services.

faqs.question: Is Mivan Restaurant Cafe implementing safety measures as a result of COVID-19?
faqs.answer: Yes, Mivan Restaurant Cafe is taking precautions against COVID-19. A full list is available within the "safety precautions" section of this page.
faqs.answerJsonLd: Yes, Mivan Restaurant Cafe is taking precautions against COVID-19. A full list is available within the "safety precautions" section of this page.

contact.address: Piyerloti Caddesi No: 34 Sultanahmet, Istanbul 34126 Turkey

reviewSnippetSections.heading: Local cuisine, Mediterranean, Turkish, European, Healthy, Middle Eastern

reviewSnippets.text: The menu is quite varied (it even includes a range of vegetarian options); we...
Here you can find meat, fish and vegetarian - all in turkich tradition.
I recommend the mix kebap and the hummus as a starter.

data.description: Cooking with passion, serving with the heart! We enjoy what we do and we want our guests to join the enjoyment!
